Title: Pet Battle Trainers: Kalimdor
Description:
It's time to put your battle skills to a true test.

You will find Steven Lisbane wandering the roads in the southern parts of Northern Stranglethorn. Seek him out and see who the superior tamer is!
ObjectivesText: Defeat Steven Lisbane in a pet battle.
PortraitGiverText: This will be a tough one!
